long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Classic Dungeon Game: Play Classic Dungeon Game right on Your Google Chrome!

CONTROLES:
- Arrow keys to move
- 'x' and 'c' for actions
- 'f' to toggle fullscreen
- 'p' to pause the game
- 'echap' to quit the game
- Press 'c' to return to menu

RULES:
- Walk through the dungeon
- Each time you enter a new room
- Your score get higher

Play more games on the left-bar menu


INSTALL EXTENSION:
Click the Dungeon icon on the Chrome toolbar
and we will open a Dungeon for you to play the game! You donâ€™t need to do anything else!
Have fun!
